description.narrative: By 2013, policies, strategies and budgets on equity, gender, early childhood and parent-teachers are prepared and adopted., which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016, 50% of enrolled girls and boys successfully complete quality primary education.

Number of education policies elaborated and adopted

actual.value: 2015:1 Policy Document: A three year Transition Plan has been drafted in a participatory and inclusive manner with the MEN and Education partners to identify needs i.e., supporting rehabilitation of schools, training of teachers, and improvement of the learning environment with the provision of books. 1
